node.text:
The stylish Club Rooms come with amenities like a private bar, plasma TV, DVD and Wi-Fi. Of course, on offer, in addition to the signature comforts and hospitality of The Raviz Kovalam are the stunning views of the Arabian Sea.

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
